You can manually create a RelativeStrengthIndex indicator, so it doesnâ€™t automatically update. Manual indicators let you update their values with any data you choose. The following reference table describes the RelativeStrengthIndex constructor.

Initializes a new instance of the RelativeStrengthIndex class with the specified name and period.

Parameters
